short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just click on the anywhere of the page and it will copy the question and answer in the clipboard. Paste it anywhere you want

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help you to copy the OAS questions and answers easily. Just click on the anywhere of the page and it will copy the question and answer in the clipboard. Paste it anywhere you want
